sqlMap.select:
SELECT tj_id, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, add_regist , regist_pass , regist_wait , regist_success , regist_fail , regist_other , regist_free , regist_all_wait, regist_all_hand, account, account_wait, account_stop , account_land , account_add , qunar_num , qunar_stop , qunar_can_use , qunar_stop_today , qunar_seal , qunar_toomuch, qunar_out , qunar_not_real, qunar_shici , qunar_goback , tongcheng_num, tongcheng_stop, tongcheng_can_use , tongcheng_stop_today, tongcheng_seal, tongcheng_toomuch, tongcheng_out, tongcheng_not_real, tongcheng_shici, tongcheng_goback, elong_num, elong_stop, elong_can_use, elong_stop_today, elong_seal, elong_toomuch, elong_out, elong_not_real, elong_shici, elong_goback FROM tj_account WHERE 1 = 1
create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#begin_info_time#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
create_time < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#end_info_time#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #everyPagefrom:Integer#,#pageSize:Integer#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tj_account
create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#begin_info_time#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
create_time < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#end_info_time#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)

SELECT tj_id, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') create_time, add_regist , regist_pass , regist_wait , regist_success , regist_fail , regist_other , regist_free , regist_all_wait, regist_all_hand, account, account_wait, account_stop , account_land , account_add , qunar_num , qunar_stop , qunar_stop_today , qunar_can_use , qunar_seal , qunar_toomuch, qunar_out , qunar_not_real, qunar_shici , qunar_goback , tongcheng_num, tongcheng_stop, tongcheng_can_use, tongcheng_stop_today, tongcheng_seal, tongcheng_toomuch, tongcheng_out, tongcheng_not_real, tongcheng_shici, tongcheng_goback, elong_num, elong_stop, elong_can_use, elong_stop_today, elong_seal, elong_toomuch, elong_out, elong_not_real, elong_shici, elong_goback FROM tj_account WHERE 1 = 1
create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#begin_info_time#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
create_time < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#end_info_time#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY create_time DESC
